price: (21) Or have they [i.e., men] taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect [the dead]?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
